entry.title: Vagrant box with Oracle XE
entry.content:
I recently had to set up a VM with Oracle for developmental use. The easiest way to do it was using Vagrant and Oracle XE. I have it working and I thought I will share my 2-bits. Requirements are to have Vagrant and VirtualBox installed. We use CentOS6 and needed a VM dedicated to Oracle. A minimal CentOS should suffice. A Vagrant box can be created as follows;

First do gem install veewee. veewee templates will list all the available templates for Vagrant boxes. Then peform the following steps in order; ``` vagrant basebox define 'CentOS' 'CentOS-6.0-x86_64-minimal' vagrant basebox build 'CentOS'

```

Enable the :hostonly option to allow conecting to the VM from the host.
